money.zumo.zumokit

Class ZumoKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • money.zumo.zumokit.ZumoKit

  • public class ZumoKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point to ZumoKit Android SDK.

    See Getting Started guide for usage details.

      Initializes ZumoKit SDK.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZumoKit

        public ZumoKit(java.lang.String apiKey,
               java.lang.String apiUrl,
               java.lang.String txServiceUrl)
        Initializes ZumoKit SDK. Should only be called once.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - ZumoKit Api-Key
        apiUrl - ZumoKit API url
        txServiceUrl - ZumoKit Transaction Service url

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Get ZumoKit SDK version.
        Returns:
        semantic version tag if exists, commit hash otherwise

      • authUser

        public void authUser(java.lang.String userTokenSet,
                     UserCallback callback)
        Authenticates user token set and returns corresponding user. On success user is set as active user. Refer to Server guide for details on how to get user token set.
        Parameters:
        userTokenSet - user token set
        callback - an interface to receive the result or error
        See Also:
        User

      • getActiveUser

        public User getActiveUser()
        Get active user if exists.
        Returns:
        active user or null

      • getUtils

        public Utils getUtils()
        Get crypto utils.
        Returns:
        crypto utils

      • getExchangeRate

        public ExchangeRate getExchangeRate(java.lang.String fromCurrency,
                                    java.lang.String toCurrency)
        Get exchange rate for selected currency pair.
        Parameters:
        fromCurrency - currency code
        toCurrency - currency code

      • getExchangeSettings

        public ExchangeSettings getExchangeSettings(java.lang.String fromCurrency,
                                            java.lang.String toCurrency)
        Get exchange settings for selected currency pair.
        Parameters:
        fromCurrency - currency code
        toCurrency - currency code

      • getFeeRates

        public FeeRates getFeeRates(java.lang.String currency)
        Get exchange fee rates for selected currency.
        Parameters:
        currency - currency code

      • fetchHistoricalExchangeRates

        public void fetchHistoricalExchangeRates(HistoricalExchangeRatesCallback callback)
        Fetch historical exchange rates for supported time intervals. On success callback returns historical exchange rates are contained in a mapping between time interval on a top level, from currency on second level, to currency on third level and ExchangeRate objects.
        Parameters:
        callback - an interface to receive the result or error
        See Also:
        HistoricalExchangeRatesInterval
